video.title: The Writer
video.synopsis: When accused of a murder eerily parallel to a plot in his novel, a best-selling crime writer must navigate a web of hidden enemies.

episodes.synopsis: After reading an aspiring novelist’s manuscript at his young lover’s request, Younis becomes the prime suspect of a shocking and puzzling murder.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: A key discovery links Younis to the deceased as other persons of interest are interrogated. The victim’s sister Amira searches for the truth.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis:
Despite the police's disapproval, Rae'd publishes investigation details. 
Majdouline eagerly volunteers to defend Younis. Shady harbors crucial evidence.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Under increased scrutiny, Younis makes a rash decision about his career. Meanwhile, Detective Nader pressures Dina to confess but uncovers much more.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Jihan threatens Younis as his relationship with Majdouline deepens. Elsewhere, Rae'd discovers the identity of Dina's husband.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: As Dina fears her secret's exposure could ruin her cushy double life, Amira finds an opportunity to gain wealth.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: An arrest takes the murder investigation in a new direction. Jihan's obsession reaches a fever pitch. An unexpected invite rattles Dina.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Younis hires a private investigator to keep tabs on a potential stalker. A familiar face pays Majdouline a surprise visit at her father's request.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Despite Majdouline's attempts to drop the case, the investigation into Tamara's killer is reopened when a seemingly solid confession falls apart.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: After a fight with Majdouline, Younis sics his P.I. on a former ally he believes is following him. Later, a celebratory family dinner turns sour.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: During an eventful dinner, Younis spots a unique piece of jewelry that sets off a series of alarming suspicions about the Azzams.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Sofia is informed of a threat from Tamara’s past, revealing another twist in the murder mystery. Younis refuses to dismiss his mistrust of Madam Azzam.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Determined to identify her harassers, Majdouline puts herself directly in harm’s way. Rae'd is persuaded to plant false information.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: After an attack on Majdouline, all clues point to one suspect. An anonymous call tips off Younis to Dina and Abu Saeed’s affair.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Amid mounting frustration, Sofia confronts Madam Azzam about her situation with Tamara. Younis starts a custody battle with Dina.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Tension erupts between Majdouline and Younis over his previous dalliance. Meanwhile, a shocking death transpires.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: With two deaths now in question, the guest list for Shady's play reveals a man assuming the identity of one of Younis' fictional characters.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: As Majdouline continues to fear for her life, Younis receives an unforeseen blessing. The dirty details of Tamara's blackmail are revealed.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: As Majdouline and Younis celebrate their relationship, an unexpected death stumps Nader. Despite Younis' threats, Abu Saeed refuses to divorce Dina.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Secrets continue to surround Madam Azzam's diamond ring and stir up trouble. Fadia comes under fire. Younis reunites with a familiar novelist.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: The return of a close friend from Younis' past brings the truth to the surface. Elsewhere, Younis is interrogated about Jihan's death.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Despite Younis' warnings to stay away, Sayyed requests Majdouline's legal services.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: After a meeting with Abu Saeed, a hysterical Majdouline confronts Younis. Sayyed steals a priceless possession.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: After a mugging, Majdouline maintains that someone is still following her. Amira and Sofia retrieve information that could destroy Mr. Azzam.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Majdouline devises a plan for Younis to retaliate against Sayyed while Rae'd plays double agent.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Sayyed continues his plot to expose Younis. Sophia and Fadia grapple with their separate dealings with Sayyed. Majdouline begins to hallucinate.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Younis is gripped by a sudden death that hits close to home. Desperate to divorce Abu Saeed, Dina contemplates making a move.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: In a vivid dream, Younis wrestles with a friend's death and the identity of Tamara's killer. Majdouline commits herself to an asylum.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of Majdouline's decision, Younis questions her motives and examines her behavior surrounding each murder.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: A chilling revelation threatens Younis and Majdouline's relationship -- and exposes the true killer.
episodes.title: Episode 30
